BenefitPrvdSearchableFld.name: BenefitPrvdSearchableFld
BenefitPrvdSearchableFld.description: Represents a collection of denormalized data from certain fields in the Provider Management data model. Provider search queries this object instead of multiple objects, which improves search performance.

BenefitId.description: The benefit associated with the provider.

BenefitName.description: The name of the benefit associated with the provider.

BenefitTypeId.description: The benefit type associated with the provider.

BenefitTypeName.description: The name of the benefit type associated with the provider.

FacilityAddress.description: The address of the service provider facility.

FacilityAddressLatitude.description: Used with facility address longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the service provider facility. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 14 decimal places.

FacilityAddressLongitude.description: Used with facility address latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the service provider facility. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 14 decimal places.

FacilityGeoLocationId.description: The geolocation ID of the facility.

FacilityId.description: The facility ID associated with the practitioner.

FacilityName.description: The name of the facility where the service is being provided.

FacilityPhone.description: The primary phone number of the facility.

GenderRestriction.description: The gender preference specified by the physician for their patients.

HighestAgeServed.description: The highest age of patients that the practitioner sees at the facility.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LicenseJurisdictionCountry.description: The country where the license of the provider is registered.

LicenseJurisdictionRegion.description: The region where the license of the provider is registered.

LicenseJurisdictionState.description: The state where the license of the provider is registered.

LicenseName.description: The name of the license given to the provider.

LicenseStatus.description: The status of the license given to the provider.

LowestAgeServed.description: The lowest age of patients that the practitioner sees at the facility.

Name.description: The name of this benefit provider searchable field record.

NationalProviderIdentifier.description: The identifier for a provider from the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System.

OperatingDaysList.description: The list of days when the practitioner is available at the facility.

OperatingHoursId.description: Identifies a set of operating hours for the practitioner at a facility.

OperatingTimeSlotList.description: The list of time slots when the practitioner is available at the facility on the operating days of the week.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

PractitionerCertificationType.description: The type of certification obtained by the practitioner.

ProviderEducationLevel.description: The education level of a person in a provider role.

ProviderPhotoUrl.description: The URL for the photograph of the provider or practitioner.

ProviderSpeciality.description: Specialty of the provider. Available in API version 59.0 only.

ProviderType.description: The type of the provider or facility.

SpecialtyId.description: A specialty offered at the provider facility that's associated with the benefit provider searchable field.

SpecialtyName.description: Name of the specialty offered at the provider facility that's associated with the benefit provider searchable field.

UniqueKey.description: A unique identifier for the benefit provider searchable field record.
